name: Donkey Kong At The Disco
description:
The year is 3 billion 6 hundred and 3, the earth is gone and all that remains is your house, your neighbor, and donkey kong merch. One day you wake up and instead of hearing the comforting silence of space, you hear your neighbor loudly yelling that you can't shmoove. Angered, you float to his house and you try obliterate him twice.

HOW TO PLAY

Move - WASD

Interact - with white ladders and power ups to help your adventure

 Don't Touch Dummy Thicc Donkey Kong's goons

Goal - Obliterate Dummy Thicc Donkey Kong
